Sentencas: Cerrnets are commonly used as anode in fuel cells.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of a green NiO/La(Sr)PO4-δ cermet anode for phosphate based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Ni/La(Sr)PO4-delta has not been synthesized before and it could be a good anode for high-temperature protonic fuel cells.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of a green NiO/La(Sr)PO4-δ cermet anode for phosphate based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this article, the preparation of Ni/La(Sr)PO4-delta by combustion synthesis using nitrates, ammonium phosphate and urea is described.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of a green NiO/La(Sr)PO4-δ cermet anode for phosphate based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this preliminary work, we are more concerned to understand the calcined powder reduction pattern with in situ Electrochemical Impedance Spectroscopy (EIS) experiments.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of a green NiO/La(Sr)PO4-δ cermet anode for phosphate based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The as-prepared powder is structurally analysed by XRD, also after each calcination treatment it) air and in reducing atmosphere, and before and after the electrical measurements were carried out.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of a green NiO/La(Sr)PO4-δ cermet anode for phosphate based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electrical characteristics of a green pellet of NiO/La(Sr)PO4-delta are studied by impedance spectroscopy as a function of temperature (50-800 degrees C) in a reducing atmosphere (10(-20) atm).
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of a green NiO/La(Sr)PO4-δ cermet anode for phosphate based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The reducing process of NiO to Ni is also followed by EIS.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of a green NiO/La(Sr)PO4-δ cermet anode for phosphate based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Finally, the morphology of this composite material analysed by EIS was observed by means of SEM/EDX.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of a green NiO/La(Sr)PO4-δ cermet anode for phosphate based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The morphology of this composite material indicates the presence of two compatible phases.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of a green NiO/La(Sr)PO4-δ cermet anode for phosphate based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: One corresponds to the La(Sr)PO4 phase and the second one to a Ni phase, according to EDX data.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of a green NiO/La(Sr)PO4-δ cermet anode for phosphate based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The low electrical conductivity values indicate that nickel agglomerates are not totally percolated in the calcined pellet as it was expected.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterisation of a green NiO/La(Sr)PO4-δ cermet anode for phosphate based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Higher conductivity values are expected when total Ni percolation occurs after sintering.
